title: Build Creative Request
description: Request parameters for building creative assets using AI-powered creative generation

adcp_version.description: AdCP schema version for this request

message.description: Natural language description of the creative brief or requirements

format_source.description: Source URL for format lookup (sales agent URL) or null for standard AdCP formats

format_id.description: Format identifier to look up from the format source

context_id.description: Optional context ID for iterative creative refinement

assets.description: Available assets to use in creative generation

output_mode.description: Output format - 'manifest' for asset-based creatives, 'code' for executable creative code

brand_card.description: Brand information manifest providing context for creative generation. Replaces brand_guidelines with a more comprehensive and standardized format.

promoted_products.description: Products or offerings being promoted in this creative. Supports SKU selection from brand card's product catalog, or inline offerings for non-commerce campaigns.

asset_filters.description: Filters to select specific assets from the brand card's asset library

tags.description: Select assets matching any of these tags (e.g., ['holiday', 'winter'])

brand_guidelines.description: DEPRECATED: Use brand_card instead. Legacy brand-specific guidelines and constraints.
